product_name: Expedition America - A National Park Odyssey
long_description: Bound in a travel-friendly three-ring binder with zipper closure, this guide supplies information on every national park in America. Authors; Terry and Stevie Halbert. Hard cover; 210 pages; 111 black-and-white photos, 65 maps. Expedition America; copyright 2002. A single park's information may be removed and inserted in the supplied plastic sleeve for hiking or biking. Book is divided into sections by region, with a regional map and information resources provided. Each park has a locator map as well as a park map showing the park's main features. Park fact sheets detail planning, when to go, accessibility, how to get there, things to do, and where to get more detailed information. Authors offer a personal review of how to get there, highlights, can't-miss attractions, recommendations and overlooked points worth your time. Tables present high and low temperatures and average precipitation per month.
short_description: Bound in a travel-friendly three-ring binder with zipper closure, this guide supplies information on every national park in America.
